metadata.Title: CVE-2018-3849 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: In the ffghtb function in NASA CFITSIO 3.42, specially crafted images parsed via the library can cause a stack-based buffer overflow overwriting arbitrary data. An attacker can deliver an FIT image to trigger this vulnerability and potentially gain code execution.

criterions.comment: cfitsio package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.430-2').
